curam.util.resources

Class ByteArrayUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.resources.ByteArrayUtil

  • public final class ByteArrayUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides various convenience methods for byte array manipulation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] base64EncodedStringToByteArray(java.lang.String input)
      Converts a string to a byte array.
      static java.lang.String byteArrayToBase64EncodedString(byte[] byteArray)
      Converts a byte array to a base64 encoded string.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • byteArrayToBase64EncodedString

        public static java.lang.String byteArrayToBase64EncodedString(byte[] byteArray)
                                                       throws AppRuntimeException
        Converts a byte array to a base64 encoded string. This is achieved by firstly encoding the byte array in base64 and then creating a string from the resulting byte array. The string itself is encoded in UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        byteArray - The byte array to be converted
        Returns:
        The base64 encoded string
        Throws:
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_UNSUPPORTED_ENCODING - if locale is not supported for construction of a new string from the byte array.

      • base64EncodedStringToByteArray

        public static byte[] base64EncodedStringToByteArray(java.lang.String input)
                                             throws AppRuntimeException
        Converts a string to a byte array. The string is decoded using base 64.
        Parameters:
        input - The Input string to be converted
        Returns:
        The byte array
        Throws:
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_UNSUPPORTED_ENCODING - if locale is not supported for converting a string to a byte array.
